attributes.action: Make a new Family Visitor visa for close non-EU relatives of UK residents
attributes.additional_details: We feel the current system ignores family connections and can cause real stress. In the EU, family members of citizens are treated as a special category.
attributes.background: We urge the Government to make a new family visitor visa for close NON-EU relatives of UK residents who are visiting the UK for 6 months or less. We want it to be faster, cheaper, and recognise family ties - unlike the current Standard Visitor visa which we feel treats relatives like tourists.
